paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant 6174delT, including penetrance data and individual records.

functional_data.summary: Relative risks of cancer varied by CJM, with the relative risk of breast cancer being significantly lower in 6174delT mutation carriers.

variants.segregation_data: No significant difference was seen in cancer risk reduction after RRSO among subgroups.
variants.additional_notes: The 6174delT variant was specifically noted for having a lower risk of breast cancer compared to non-CJM BRCA2 carriers.
key_quotes: Relative risks of cancer varied by CJM, with the relative risk of breast cancer being significantly lower in 6174delT mutation carriers than in non-CJM BRCA2 carriers.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in BRCA2 was identified in the text.
